resources.string:
Hi, my name is Kristina. 

I love photography. 

I like taking pictures of sceneries and macro images of flowers and anything that interests me. 
Fun fact is that I have never been anywhere outside the East Coast! 

I want to travel all over the US and overseas one day to take more photos of new places. 
And I also want to experience new cultures and become more proficient at new languages one day.
